1370: Hodine moved to Bloemendaelse straet.A.10 after marriage.
Got married to Ghodscalc at age 14 in 1370.
Gave birth to Godeweris in 1370 at age 14.
1372: Gave birth to Aghata in 1372 at age 16.
1373: Gave birth to Mewekinus in 1373 at age 17.
1374: Lost son Reynerus when Reynerus was 0 years old.
Gave birth to stillborn Reynerus in 1374 at age 18.
1375: Gave birth to Douwen in 1375 at age 19.
1377: Gave birth to Gilis in 1377 at age 21.
1378: Lost son Gilis when Gilis was 2 years old.
1380: Gave birth to Lotijn in 1380 at age 24.
1383: Lost daughter Douwen when Douwen was 9 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1385: Lost son Mewekinus when Mewekinus was 13 years old.
1389: Lost daughter Godeweris when Godeweris was 20 years old.
